kpi.name: M1001C732

kpi_info.title: RRC SETUP FAIL DUE TO AC DL POWER
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC setup failures caused by Admission Control because of downlink power limitation. M1001C3 is also updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC decides to reject the RRC connection request because of downlink power admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC SETUP FAIL DUE TO AC DL POWER
